items.abstract:
<jats:title>Abstract</jats:title>
            <jats:p>We answer some questions from [4] by giving suitable examples of small Polish structures. First, we present a class of small Polish group structures without generic elements. Next, we construct a first example of a small non-zero-dimensional Polish <jats:italic>G</jats:italic>-group.</jats:p>
title: New Examples of Small Polish Structures

items.abstract:
<jats:title>Abstract</jats:title>
            <jats:p>We prove that each <jats:italic>ω</jats:italic>-categorical, generically stable group is solvable-by-finite.</jats:p>
title: On ω-categorical, generically stable groups
